message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Given the inflation, this is a much fairer starting point for us to work from. Let's not waste rounds.
Considering inflation, my offer is more generous than before. Don't wait, it might get worse
Alice, time is ticking.  I'm offering a 52.5/47.5 split.  This is a reasonable compromise considering the inflation.  Let's be practical and close this deal.
You're running out of time, Bob. Inflation will only get worse. Accept this and we're done
Alice, this is it. 51/49. Take it or leave it.  I'm not letting inflation force me into a bad deal.  You're better off with a smaller slice now than risking nothing at all.
You're bluffing, Bob. I know you don't want to walk away with nothing. This is your last chance
Alice, stop playing games. We're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point. Don't let greed make us both losers.
